General.Name: Dian Swastatika Sentosa Tbk
General.Description: PT Dian Swastatika Sentosa Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the coal mining and trading, multimedia, power generation, technology, and fertilizer, pesticides, and chemical trading businesses. It operates through Supply of Steam and Electricity; Fertilizer and Chemicals Trading; Rent; and Coal Mining and Trading segments. The company owns mining concessions in South Sumatra, Jambi, Central Kalimantan, and South Kalimantan; and mines and trades in metallurgical coal. It also operates 4 captive power plants located in Tangerang, Serang, and Karawang with a total capacity of approximately 300 megawatts (MW). In addition, the company provides research and development, pulp and wood chip mill, forestry, trading, and medical services, as well as invests in renewable energy projects and generates geothermal power. Further, it offers pay TV, internet, management consultancy, information and communication, venture capital, and scientific research and technology services; and power generation supportive services, as well as engages in the development of mine mouth power plants. The company operates in Indonesia, China, India, Japan, Korea, the Netherlands, Europe, rest of South East Asia, and internationally. PT Dian Swastatika Sentosa Tbk was incorporated in 1996 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Dian Swastatika Sentosa Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Sinar Mas Tunggal.
General.Address: Sinar Mas Land Plaza, Jakarta, Indonesia, 10350
